tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE protected_area_species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    species_category VARCHAR(100),
    species_population INT
)

CREATE TABLE SpeciesDistribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT NOT NULL,
    area_id INT NOT NULL,
    distribution_count INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES ProtectedArea(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE species_distribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    area_id INT,
    population INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species(species_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES protected_area(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE researcher (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255),
    area_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES protected_area(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE species_location (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id UUID NOT NULL,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);
